mapper.insert: insert into area (id, area_kbn, area_name, area_name_en, follow_area_id, detail_address, centerLon, centerLat, avg_pm25, avg_pm10, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaKbn,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{followAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{centerlon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{centerlat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{avgPm25,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avgPm10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update area set area_kbn = #{areaKbn,jdbcType=CHAR}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name_en = #{areaNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, follow_area_id = #{followAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, centerLon = #{centerlon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, centerLat = #{centerlat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, avg_pm25 = #{avgPm25,jdbcType=INTEGER}, avg_pm10 = #{avgPm10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, area_kbn, area_name, area_name_en, follow_area_id, detail_address, centerLon, centerLat, avg_pm25, avg_pm10, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from area where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, area_kbn, area_name, area_name_en, follow_area_id, detail_address, centerLon, centerLat, avg_pm25, avg_pm10, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from area
